name: Warrior Drones
description:
Shoot them all drones!

Description:

Game theme:

Play in space and shoot everything that comes your way. Play smart and destroy enemy drones to increase your score.There 30 levels for you to get challenged with. Try to beat them all! This is a rail shooter designed to make players move efficiently to defeat all the levels

Features:

Responsive drone controls Shooting mechanics

Large map in space Progressive difficulty

5 Unlockable drones,each one uses a different weapon

Controls:

Left click to shoot

WASD To move
